mainText:
Steve Jobs was more than the creator of apple for me he was a 
inspiration to make technological advances in life.  He is my idol. I've 
always bought the products he has made He was the reason why I love 
computers and technology!  He will always be in my heart as a incredible 
person who has done magnificent things in life.  But with his death has 
motivated me to become like him and make products better than ever!


	RIP Steve Jobs You will always be remembered

	Hope to be like you one day and plan on it.
author: Layton
